content: get ready to whip up the cutest quickest and most eco-friendly easter eggs ever with the **reusable crochet easter eggs** pattern you can make refillable reusable and washable eggs in minutes using two strands of cotton yarn held together these little eggs work up fast are soft yet sturdy and can be used year after year no plastic needed these handmade eggs are perfect for easter baskets decor or gifting and they also make a great stash-busting project a video tutorial is included with the pattern crochet hook i 5 5mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch markers 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 yarn wecrochet dishie 5 100% cotton 190yds/100g yarn will be held double-stranded throughout yardage 35 yds per egg yarn substitutions lily sugar n cream worsted 6 100% cotton 120yds/70g village yarn craft cotton 7 100% cotton solids 115yds/71g abbreviations chain s - chain s fsc - foundation single_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es gauge 14 sts and 14 row = 4 by 4 in single_crochet using the hook-over method gauge is not critical for this project not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 8 sizes one size skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 9 instagram https //www instagram
